I hope you are well. This is a follow-up regarding the renewal terms for your health insurance policy that we sent to you.
As a reminder, your current policy details are:

Policy Holder : LOUISA FRANCIS VIEGAS
Policy Period : 14/02/2024 - 13/02/2025
Existing Insurer : ORIENT INSURANCE CO.(PSC) 
Polcy Number : P/01/1306/2024/5192

We understand that reviewing insurance policies can take time, and we want to ensure that all your questions are addressed. If you have any questions or need further clarification regarding the renewal terms, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our goal is to ensure you have all the necessary information to make an informed decision about your coverage.

Please let us know if there are any changes or additional coverage options you would like to consider. We are here to assist you in any way possible.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. We look forward to your response and assisting you with your policy renewal.

Best Regards,
Individual Medical Department
Nasco Middle East
Email: IndividualMedical-Dubai@nascodubai.com
Tel:+971 4 351 4292
